description: snow and ice removal from roofs on Building Block 1-2-3 Ottawa
duration_in_months: You should have 06-06-2026 + 10 months duration session.
full_summary:
================
* **Title (English)**: EJ196-241181 Snow removal Blocks 1-2-3
* **Title (French)**: EJ196-241181 Déneigement Îlots 1-2-3

Original solicitation number: WS4583752481

* **Publication Date**: 2024-06-06
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-08-22T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-11-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2026-10-31
* **Solicitation Status**: Expired

**Scope of Work**: The Contracting Authority is seeking bidders to supply and outlay all essential labour, supervision, transportation, storage, necessary material and apparatus to carry out the snow and ice removal from roofs on Buildings Block 1-2-3, Ottawa. Site visits have been arranged for July 4, 2024, at 10:00 am.

**Trade Agreements**: Bids are subject to the provisions of the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Contact Information**:

* Pierre Lavigne (SPAC/PSPC)
* pierre.lavigne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Please note that responses to this tender must be submitted by August 22, 2024, at 2:00 pm DST. Non-compliance with the site visit requirements may result in a bidder's non-responsiveness.

**Key Dates**:

* July 4, 2024: Site visit
* August 22, 2024: Tender closing date

You can get more information from: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19941791?extsite=MTk5
